item.title: Ubuntu Server Setup and Docker Install
item.description: Introduction # In part two of our web hosting series we will guide you through the process of setting up your own web server using Ubuntu, we install Docker Desktop and configure a static IP for our server.

item.title: Demystifying Domains: A Guide to Acquiring Your Own
item.description: Introduction # Welcome to part one of a multipart blog series that will guide you through self-hosting a website or service like a VPN.
